mapper.select: SELECT PMB_PASSWORD FROM PMB WHERE PMB_CODE= #{pmbCode}
SELECT NVL(TO_CHAR(TO_NUMBER(MAX(PMB_CODE))+1),TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')||'01') AS PMBCODE FROM PMB WHERE SUBSTR(PMB_CODE,1,6) = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMM')
SELECT CLA_CODE AS PMBCLASS,CLA_NAME ||'['|| CLA_NUM || ']' AS PMBCLASSNAME FROM CLA
SELECT MLV_CODE AS PMBLEVEL, MLV_NAME AS PMBLEVELNAME FROM MLV
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PMB(PMB_CODE, PMB_PASSWORD, PMB_NAME, PMB_MLVCODE, PMB_CLACODE, PMB_EMAIL) VALUES(#{pmbCode}, #{pmbPassword}, #{pmbName}, #{pmbLevel}, #{pmbClass}, #{pmbEmail})
INSERT INTO ASL(ASL_PMBCODE, ASL_DATE, ASL_PUBLICIP, ASL_PRIVATEIP, ASL_ACTION) VALUES(#{pmbCode}, DEFAULT, #{aslPublicIp}, #{aslPrivateIp}, #{aslAction})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ACCESSINFO WHERE PMBCODE = #{pmbCode}

SELECT ASL_PUBLICIP || ':' || ASL_PRIVATEIP as ASLPUBLICIP FROM ASL WHERE TO_CHAR(ASL_DATE, 'YYMMDD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') AND ASL_PMBCODE = #{pmbCode} GROUP BY ASL_PMBCODE, ASL_PUBLICIP, ASL_PRIVATEIP HAVING SUM(ASL_ACTION) = 1
SELECT * FROM PMBMEMBERS WHERE PMBCODE != #{pmbCode}

SELECT AUL.AUL_SPMBCODE AS SPMBCODE, PMB.PMB_NAME AS SENDERNAME, AUL.AUL_RPMBCODE AS RPMBCODE, TO_CHAR(AUL.AUL_INVITEDATE,'YYMMDDHH24MISS') AS INVITEDATE FROM AUL INNER JOIN PMB ON AUL.AUL_SPMBCODE = PMB.PMB_CODE WHERE AUL_RPMBCODE = #{rpmbCode} AND AUL_AUTHRESULT = 'NA' AND SYSDATE <= AUL_INVITEDATE + (5/(24*60))

SELECT SPMBCODE, SENDERNAME, RPMBCODE, TO_CHAR(INVITEDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS INVITEDATE, TO_CHAR(EXPIREDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS EXPIREDATE, AUTHRESULT FROM RINVITEINFO WHERE RPMBCODE = #{pmbCode} AND INVITEDATE >= (SYSDATE - 1)

SELECT SPMBCODE, RPMBCODE, RECEIVERNAME, TO_CHAR(INVITEDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS INVITEDATE, TO_CHAR(EXPIREDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS EXPIREDATE, AUTHRESULT, AUTHRESULTNAME FROM SINVITEINFO WHERE SPMBCODE = #{pmbCode} AND INVITEDATE >= (SYSDATE - 2)

update.foreach: UPDATE PRM SET PRM_ACCEPT=#{memberInfo.proAccept} WHERE PRM_PROCODE = #{proCode} AND PRM_PMBCODE = #{memberInfo.pmbCode}

mapper.update: UPDATE AUL SET AUL_AUTHRESULT = #{aulResultCode} WHERE AUL_SPMBCODE = #{sander} AND AUL_RPMBCODE = #{receiver} AND AUL_INVITEDATE = TO_DATE(#{inviteDate}, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')
mapper.select: SELECT PROCODE, PRONAME, "PERIOD", PRM.PRM_PMBCODE AS DIRCODE, PMB.PMB_NAME AS DIRECTOR FROM MYPROJECT MP INNER JOIN PRM ON MP.PROCODE = PRM.PRM_PROCODE INNER JOIN PMB ON PRM.PRM_PMBCODE = PMB.PMB_CODE WHERE MP.PMBCODE = #{pmbCode} AND MP.PRMACCEPT = 'AC' AND PRM.PRM_POSITION IS NOT NULL AND PRM.PRM_PMBCODE= #{pmbCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) AS PEOPLE FROM PRM WHERE PRM_PROCODE = #{proCode} AND PRM_ACCEPT = 'AC'

select.foreach: SELECT * FROM SENDLIST WHERE PROCODE = #{proCode} AND PROACCEPT = #{memberInfo.proAccept}

mapper.select: SELECT PMB_CODE AS PMBCODE, PMB_NAME AS PMBNAME, PMB_EMAIL AS PMBEMAIL FROM PMB WHERE PMB_CODE NOT IN(SELECT PRM_PMBCODE FROM PRM WHERE PRM_PROCODE = #{proCode})
SELECT * FROM INVITEDMEMBER WHERE PROCODE = #{proCode}

SELECT PROCODE, PMBCODE, PMBNAME, PMBEMAIL, TO_CHAR(EXPIREDMEMBER.INVITEDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS INVITEDATE, TO_CHAR(EXPIREDMEMBER.EXPIREDATE,'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AS EXPIREDATE FROM EXPIREDMEMBER WHERE PROCODE = #{proCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MOU WHERE MOU_PROCODE = #{proCode} AND MOU_CODE = #{mouCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOU(MOU_PROCODE, MOU_CODE, MOU_NAME, MOU_COMMENTS) VALUES(#{proCode},#{mouCode},#{mouName},#{mouComments})
mapper.select: SELECT MOU_PROCODE AS PROCODE, MOU_CODE AS MOUCODE, MOU_NAME AS MOUNAME, MOU_COMMENTS AS MOUCOMMENTS FROM MOU WHERE MOU_PROCODE = #{proCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM JOS WHERE JOS_PROCODE = #{proCode} AND JOS_CODE = #{josCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO JOS(JOS_PROCODE, JOS_CODE, JOS_NAME, JOS_COMMENTS) VALUES(#{proCode},#{josCode},#{josName},#{josComments})
mapper.select: SELECT JOS_PROCODE AS PROCODE, JOS_CODE AS JOSCODE, JOS_NAME AS JOSNAME, JOS_COMMENTS AS JOSCOMMENTS FROM JOS WHERE JOS_PROCODE = #{proCode}
mapper.update: UPDATE MJ SET MJ_PRMPMBCODE=#{pmbCode} WHERE MJ_PROCODE=#{proCode} AND MJ_MOUCODE=#{mouCode} AND MJ_JOSCODE=#{josCode}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MJ WHERE MJ_PROCODE =#{proCode} AND MJ_MOUCODE = #{mouCode} AND MJ_JOSCODE = #{josCode} AND MJ_PRMPMBCODE = #{pmbCode}
mapper.select: SELECT PROCODE, MOUCODE, JOSCODE, PMBCODE, MOUNAME, JOSNAME, PMBNAME FROM MJINFO WHERE PROCODE = #{proCode}
SELECT PRM_PMBCODE AS PMBCODE, PMB_NAME AS PMBNAME FROM PRM INNER JOIN PMB ON PRM_PMBCODE=PMB_CODE WHERE PRM_PROCODE = ${proCode} AND PRM_ACCEPT ='AC'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM MET WHERE MET_MJPROCODE = ${proCode} AND MET_MJMOUCODE = ${mouCode} AND MET_MJJOSCODE = ${josCode} AND MET_CODE = ${metCode} AND MET_MCCODE = '${mcCode}'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MET(MET_MJPROCODE, MET_MJMOUCODE, MET_MJJOSCODE, MET_CODE, MET_NAME, MET_MCCODE) VALUES(#{proCode},#{mouCode},#{josCode},#{metCode},#{metName},#{mcCode})
mapper.select: SELECT PROCODE, MOUCODE, JOSCODE, METCODE, METNAME, MCCODE, MOUNAME, JOSNAME, MCNAME FROM PROCESSINFO WHERE PROCODE = #{proCode}
SELECT MCA_NAME AS MCNAME, MCA_CODE AS MCCODE FROM MCA

SELECT PRO.PRO_NAME AS PRONAME, PRM.PRM_POSITION AS PRMPOSITION, PRM.PRM_PMBCODE AS PMBCODE, PMB.PMB_NAME AS PMBNAME, TO_CHAR(PRO.PRO_START, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS PROSTART, TO_CHAR(PRO.PRO_END, 'YYYY.MM.DD') AS PROEND FROM PRM INNER JOIN PRO ON PRO.PRO_CODE = PRM.PRM_PROCODE INNER JOIN PMB ON PMB_CODE = PRM.PRM_PMBCODE WHERE PRO_CODE = #{proCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MOU WHERE MOU_PROCODE = ${proCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM JOS WHERE JOS_PROCODE = ${proCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MJ WHERE MJ_PROCODE = ${proCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MET WHERE MET_MJPROCODE = ${proCode}
SELECT PRO_CODE AS PROCODE, PRO_NAME AS PRONAME, PRM_PMBCODE AS PMBCODE FROM PRO INNER JOIN PRM ON PRM_PROCODE=PRO_CODE WHERE PRM_PMBCODE = #{pmbCode} AND PRM_ACCEPT ='AC'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROCESSINFO WHERE PROCODE=#{proCode} AND MCCODE=#{mcCode}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM PROCESSINFO WHERE PROCODE=#{proCode} AND MCCODE=#{mcCode} AND PMBCODE=#{pmbCode}
SELECT MAX(PRO_CODE) AS PROCODE FROM PRO INNER JOIN PRM ON PRM_PROCODE=PRO_CODE WHERE PRM_PMBCODE = '20220701' AND PRM_ACCEPT ='AC'
SELECT (MOUNAME||'_'||JOSNAME) AS MJNAME, PROCODE, MOUCODE, JOSCODE FROM MJINFO WHERE PROCODE=#{proCode} AND PMBCODE=#{pmbCode}
